name: Liam Taylor
routine: Liam is a college student who sleeps around 1am after late-night study sessions and wakes up at 8am for classes.
occupation: Liam is studying computer science in Sydney, with classes often scattered throughout the day.
thoughts: Liam has been brainstorming a new mobile app idea for his entrepreneurship course and is planning a pitch to potential on the weekend.
lifestyle: Liam enjoys a casual lifestyle, prefers takeaway food, is active in the tech community, and loves surfing on weekends.

name: Elena Petrova
routine: Elena sleeps at 10pm and wakes up at 6am to prepare her children for school before heading to work.
occupation: Elena is a high school teacher, teaching history in St. Petersburg. Her school day starts at 8 am and ends at 3 pm.
thoughts: Elena recently has been concerned about her son's performance in school and is considering getting him a tutor. She plans to discuss this with her husband over the weekend.
lifestyle: Elena follows a typical Russian cuisine, enjoys classical music to unwind, and spends her weekends at the local park with her family. She prefers reading historical novels in her spare time.

name: Jia Li
routine: Jia Li typically sleeps at 11:30 pm and wakes at 6:30 am to practice tai chi.
occupation: She manages a traditional Chinese medicine clinic and works from 8 am to 6 pm.
thoughts: Lately, she's been pondering about ways to integrate technology into her practice to reach more people, especially after reading a relevant article on February 1st, 2024.
lifestyle: Jia Li enjoys a balance of yin and yang in her diet, practices meditation, and always brews herself a pot of oolong tea while working.
